question_content.description:
### Problem22
## Components of Machine's State 


 Which of the following are components of a machine's state (value at the beginning of each instruction cycle determines what happens next)? Mark all that apply.

**Choices:**

A. Registers

B. IR

C. Memory

D. PC

E. ALU
 ### Quote 

coursera lecture quiz
question_content.author: Yike Guo
